SENESCHAL.Name: Seneschal Program
SENESCHAL.PauseMessage: Seneschal Program has been working for a while. Would you like to continue?
SENESCHAL.ToolLimitPause: Seneschal Program has made {count} tool calls. Would you like to continue?
SENESCHAL.TimeLimitPause: Seneschal Program has been running for {seconds} seconds. Would you like to continue?
SENESCHAL.ConnectionError: Failed to connect to Seneschal Program backend

Settings.BackendUrlHint: The URL of the Seneschal Program backend service (e.g., http://localhost:8080)
Settings.SelectedModelHint: The AI model to use for chat (configure via Model Selection menu)
Settings.VisionModelHint: The AI model to use for image captioning during document ingestion

ModelSelection.Name: Model Selection
ModelSelection.Title: Select AI Models
ModelSelection.Label: Configure Models
ModelSelection.Hint: Select which AI models to use from the backend
ModelSelection.SelectHint: Choose a model for chat conversations
ModelSelection.VisionHint: Choose a vision model (e.g., llava, moondream) to caption extracted images. Leave empty to skip image captioning.

Backend.Title: Backend Settings
Backend.MenuHint: Configure the Seneschal backend service settings
Backend.Overridden: Custom value (click reset to revert to default)

Models.ChatModelHint: The LLM to use for chat conversations
Models.VisionModelHint: Model for image captioning during document ingestion (e.g., llava, moondream). Leave empty to skip captioning.
Models.EmbeddingModelHint: Model for generating text embeddings for document search (e.g., nomic-embed-text)

Ollama.BaseUrlHint: URL of the Ollama service for LLM inference
Ollama.TemperatureHint: Controls randomness in responses (0.0 = deterministic, 2.0 = very random)
Ollama.RequestTimeoutHint: Maximum time to wait for Ollama responses

Embeddings.ChunkSizeHint: Target size for document text chunks
Embeddings.ChunkOverlapHint: Overlap between adjacent chunks for context continuity

Agentic.HardTimeoutHint: Maximum total time for an agentic loop before forced termination
Agentic.ExternalToolTimeoutHint: Maximum time to wait for FVTT tool execution
Agentic.ToolCallPauseThresholdHint: Number of tool calls before prompting to continue (use max value to disable)

Limits.MaxDocumentSizeHint: Maximum file size for document uploads (100MB = 104857600)
Limits.ConversationTtlHint: How long to keep conversations before automatic cleanup (7 days = 604800)
Limits.MaxConversationsPerUserHint: Maximum stored conversations per user (0 = unlimited)

Advanced.McpEnabledHint: Enable the Model Context Protocol server for external integrations
Advanced.McpPathHint: URL path for the MCP server endpoint
Advanced.TravellerMapUrlHint: Base URL for the Traveller Map API
Advanced.TravellerMapTimeoutHint: Request timeout for Traveller Map API calls
Advanced.TravellerWorldsUrlHint: Base URL for the Traveller Worlds map generation service
Advanced.TravellerWorldsChromePathHint: Path to Chrome/Chromium executable for headless browser automation (leave empty to use system default)

Settings.EnablePlayerAccess: Allow Players to Use Seneschal Program
Settings.EnablePlayerAccessHint: When enabled, players can access Seneschal Program with limited permissions
Settings.MaxActionsPerRequestHint: Limit the number of actions the AI can take per request
Settings.ChatCommandPrefixHint: Prefix for one-shot queries in chat (e.g., /sen-ai)

Documents.Title: Document Management
Documents.DeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this document?
Documents.DeleteImagesConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all extracted images for this document?
Documents.ReextractImagesConfirm: This will delete existing images and re-extract them from the PDF. Continue?
Documents.ReextractImagesNote: This may take a while if a vision model is configured for image captioning.
Documents.ReextractImagesQueued: Image re-extraction queued. Processing will continue in the background.

Images.Title: Image Browser
Images.Empty: No images extracted from this document.
Images.DeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
Images.CopyError: Failed to copy image to FVTT assets.

Notifications.NotConfigured: Seneschal Program backend URL is not configured. Please set it in module settings.
Notifications.PlayerAccessDisabled: Player access to Seneschal Program is disabled.
Notifications.MixedContent: Cannot connect: Foundry is running on HTTPS but the backend URL uses HTTP. Either configure the backend to use HTTPS, or access Foundry via HTTP.
Notifications.WebSocketNotConnected: WebSocket connection to Seneschal Program backend is not established. Please wait for reconnection or refresh the page.
